description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use your shield to protect your base from attacking tanks and repel their own projectiles back at them! Earn money by killing tanks and buy upgrades between levels to stay one step ahead of the enemy. 25 levels of tank-busting mayhem await!
